Text: It works, so I guess it's a good torrent. No virus as far as I can tell.
Also, please seed so that more people can download the files.
But why would I want to install this? Aren't the voices there already?

I imagine it's for people who only have voices in their language or something else but can't have the original english voices, which have a pretty good quality.

I've already seen RUS or DE versions with higher seeds than the EN version.
Fake comments. Thanks Anonymous to flood, spam with your shitty uploads.

Waaa ? It's my upload, and I've upload this mostly for my friends.
Sure, if you already have the english voice that's fine, but if you have... hum.. say: a French steam version AND you don't want to re-DL ALL the game only for 2 files, this torrent is for you.
